actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution reconstituting and reauthorizing the Senate World Climate Convention Observer Group.
short_title: World Climate Convention Observer Group Resolution

summary.text: World Climate Convention Observer Group Resolution - Reconstitutes and reauthorizes the Senate World Climate Convention Observer Group to monitor the World Climate Convention process. Requires that all foreign travel of the Observer Group be authorized jointly by the Majority and Minority Leaders of the Senate, and upon the recommendation of both the Chairman and Co-Chairman of the Group. Authorizes the Majority Leader or the Minority Leader to designate one other Senator of his party who is not a member of the Group to travel and participate in its activities in his stead, if such Leader does not travel on an official trip of the Group. Terminates this Act on July 31, 1992. Rescinds the force and effect of S.Res. 110 (102d Congress).

titles.title: World Climate Convention Observer Group Resolution
A resolution reconstituting and reauthorizing the Senate World Climate Convention Observer Group.
